name: Le's House
address: House 15A, Alley 89C Ly Nam De, Old Quarter, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Offering accommodation with air conditioning, Le's House is located in Hanoi, 600 metres from St. Joseph Cathedral. Vietnam Fine Arts Museum is 800 metres from the property. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

All units include a seating and dining area. All units have a kitchen equipped with a microwave and fridge. Bed linen is available.

Le's House also includes a sun terrace.

Ngoc Son Temple is 800 metres from Le's House. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 21 km from Le's House.
